title: (x) "Centro de Explicações de Leiria" logo rounded geometric sans - Alba {Manlio}
content:
Hi, I’m Paulo and I would really appreciate your help on identifying this font, I need it badly.

It’s the CEL logo one on this webpage.  
 [http://cel.paginas.sapo.pt](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104015914/http:/cel.paginas.sapo.pt/)  
Cheers,  
Paulo Moço  
(Portugal)

 [‹ (x) "Back to business" bold serif w/distinctive 'K' - LTR Federal {Dennis Hill}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104015914/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35660 "Go to previous forum topic") [World of Warcraft Font "The Burning Crusade" logo ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104015914/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35657 "Go to next forum topic")
author: paulo.moco

comments.content: It could be a slightly modified [Alba](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104015914/http:/www.urbanfonts.com/fonts/Alba.htm)
You’re right Manlio, it seems the lowercase **r** has been turn upside-down to make the **l**.

THANKS GUYS!!!!  
You’ve been very helpfull. I spent days looking on thousands(LITERALLY) of fonts before I found this forum. If I can ever help you guys with anything, count on me.

Once again my thanks,  
Paulo Moço
